g.text: <<event>> NewCertificate(certificateId: bytes32, candidateAddress: address, issuerAddress: address)

getCourseByLearner(_learner: address): (name: string, institute: string, instructor: string, price: uint256, isActive: bool)

<<event>> UpdateCourse(courseId: bytes32, trainer: address, isActive: bool)

updateCourse(_courseId: uint256, _name: string, _institute: string, _instructor: string, _price: uint256, _isActive: bool): bool <<isUser>>

constructor(_recordChainAddress: address, _courseName: string, _owner: address, _sender: address, _recipient: address, _isPaid: bool, _creationTime: uint256, _receivalTime: uint256)
